p: The use of vertical integrals to describe the circulation is a simplification of what is a three‐dimensional problem, as is the use of a model in which the important eddy field is only included through parameterizations such as in CMIP5 and CMIP6 (Church & Miles, 2013; Eyring et al., 2016; Stouffer et al., 2017). Future work is intended to apply this and related machinery to fully eddy‐resolving ocean states.
